name: Cauldron (itch) (Pixels By Molly)
description:
Overview

Cauldron is a grid based puzzle game about starring a tiny witch and her never ending quest to reach her mystical cauldron. Watch out for all the bats and ghouls looking to thwart your efforts!

Note: This is the first game I made in Unity.

Controls 

Movement = Arrow keys
Select = Enter Key
